channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Customer Relationship Management (Email Management - S4CRM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Customer Relationship Management (Email Management - S4CRM)

item.title: CVE-2019-0368|2024-08-04T17:44:16.523Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20customer%20relationship%20management%20%28email%20management%20-%20s4crm%29
item.description: SAP Customer Relationship Management (Email Management), versions: S4CRM before 1.0 and 2.0, BBPCRM before 7.0, 7.01, 7.02, 7.12, 7.13 and 7.14, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs within the mail client resulting in Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability.
